content: **this pattern was part of a live creative crochet corner event it is free when signing up for the creative crochet corner newsletter 1 the replay of the live tutorial can be watched for free on the creative crochet corner 2 website or on you tube 3 ** this macramé-inspired plant hanger adds new life to the walls of any room create your own beautiful hanging garden with plants of various sizes this project is much simpler than it appears - with an easy 2-row repeat and one quick seam it s perfect for an adventurous beginner 1 https //go creativecrochetcorner com/a39096/ 2 https //www creativecrochetcorner com/video/hanging-garden-live-tutorial-with-brenda-k-b-anderson/ 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=axroj_rw4zc&t=235s
